meanings.sent1: The kids littered their toys all over the living room.
meanings.sent2: The park was littered with trash after the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels littered the yard with acorns, creating a messy treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was littered with memories of the past, making it hard to focus on the present.
meanings.sent5: The wind littered the colorful leaves across the sidewalk, creating a beautiful mess.

meanings.definition: Covered or filled with scattered objects
meanings.sent1: The beach was littered with seashells of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house was littered with old newspapers and dusty furniture.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome stood proudly in the littered flower bed, surrounded by colorful blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her desk was littered with sticky notes and pens, a chaotic yet familiar sight.
meanings.sent5: The forest floor was littered with fallen leaves, creating a crunchy carpet underfoot.
